title: Test Multiple Markers Per Question
content: This test verifies that multiple sections can be highlighted for a single question.

questions.instructions: Choose TRUE, FALSE or NOT GIVEN.
questions.question: 1. Multiple sections can prove a single answer.
2. The system can only highlight one section.

reading_texts.title: Multi-Section Highlighting Test
reading_texts.content:
This reading passage demonstrates the ability to highlight multiple sections for a single question. This is useful when proof of the answer appears in different parts of the text, rather than in just one location.

The original system would only highlight the first marker it found. However, sometimes evidence for a single answer is scattered across multiple paragraphs and both sections need to be visible.

For question 2, there is only one marker: the new system can highlight multiple sections simultaneously which was not possible before.

This enhancement allows students to see all relevant evidence at once when they click the "Show me the section of the reading passage" button.

_metadata.test_purpose: Verify multiple reading passage markers for a single question
